title: Test your skills! 1v1's 2v2's 3v3's amd 5v5's for money!

embed.description: GameBattles is the world leader in League of Legends for PC online video game competition featuring League of Legends tournaments, ladders, teams, scores, stats, news and more!

body:
League of legends has a great soloq system but it does get tiring at times, and normal games being toxic 90% of the time there isnt many other ways to play league and pass the time

Gamebattles has 4 League of Legends ladders! check them out! Win money! http://gamebattles.majorleaguegaming.com/pc/league-of-legends/ladder/1v1-proving-grounds/

replies.body: you have to be a premium member to earn money lol

> [{quoted}](name=dannyngn,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=vHV6kvUK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-20T00:08:15.088+0000)
>
> you have to be a premium member to earn money lol

No you dont, placing at the end of a season can grant you money, or yes you can enter tournaments that are paid but you can easily win money without paying
